system.requirements:
Tier 1; Perception 30
Aptitudes: Perception, Fieldcraft, Tzeentch
system.effect:
Halves all Penalties (rounded up) for fighting with Melee Weapons without the benefit of sight due to some obscuring effect such as Fog, Smoke or Darkness.
DH 2E: Ignore all penalties instead of half them.
